sections.title: Steel Falcon (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Steel Falcon class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Enemy of Slavers (Ex) (Steel Falcon)
sections.description: Grants scaling bonuses on skill checks and attack/damage rolls against slavers and slave owners, functioning as a favored enemy bonus that increases at 5th and 9th levels.

sections.title: Heart of Freedom (Ex) (Steel Falcon)
sections.description: Provides a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against charm and compulsion effects and attempts to possess the character's body or mind.

sections.title: Sailor and Survivalist (Ex) (Steel Falcon)
sections.description: Adds class level to Profession (sailor) checks and Survival checks for getting along in the wild and navigating wilderness.

sections.title: Luck of the Eagle (Ex) (Steel Falcon)
sections.description: Allows rerolling d20 rolls a limited number of times per day, with uses increasing at 6th and 10th levels.

sections.title: Heroic Speech (Su) (Steel Falcon)
sections.description: Functions like bardic performance inspire courage, with class levels stacking with bard levels and usable for rounds per day equal to class level plus Charisma modifier.

sections.title: Natural Traps (Ex) (Steel Falcon)
sections.description: Grants Learn Ranger Trap as a bonus feat and allows learning additional extraordinary ranger traps at higher levels.

sections.title: Comrade’s Bond (Ex) (Steel Falcon)
sections.description: Grants allies half the Steel Falcon's enemy of slavers bonus as a move action that improves to swift then free action at higher levels.

sections.title: Superior Aid (Ex) (Steel Falcon)
sections.description: When using aid another action, provides a +4 bonus instead of the normal +2 bonus to attack rolls or AC.

sections.title: Subtle Manipulator (Ex) (Steel Falcon)
sections.description: After studying a target for a full-round action, grants a +5 circumstance bonus on Diplomacy checks against that target for days equal to Wisdom modifier.

sections.title: Sky’s Blessing (Su) (Steel Falcon)
sections.description: Provides bonuses to Acrobatics jumps and Perception checks, plus constant feather fall that can be reactivated as a move action if dispelled.

sections.title: Chainbreaker (Ex) (Steel Falcon)
sections.description: Attacks against bindings and chains bypass hardness and grants bonuses to escape manacles and ropes.

sections.title: Sky’s Fury (Su) (Steel Falcon)
sections.description: Creates a fear aura that affects enemies with a fear spell while allowing allies to make new saves against charm, compulsion, and possession effects.
